about_the_game:
This game merges stars produced from a black hole,
The game is a puzzle game to grow stars by merging stars produced from a black hole.

To give you the full experience of the collision of the 15 types of stars (satellites, quasi-planets, and planets) in our solar system,
The game is a 3D game with added physics, depth and rotation controls.

Gameplay can be controlled with the left hand only,
Enjoy the game while enjoying a snack with your right hand while listening to the soothing music.

You will be baptized with a lot of physics before the sun is formed,
We hope you enjoy the chaos of the game.



【Attention】
I am using my favorite music by scottbuckley for this game.

As long as his music is credited with his name,
You can use his music for free in any project (including commercial ones) as long as his name is credited.

That's why his credit is always displayed in the lower left corner of the game screen,
Even if he distributes his music on Youtube, there is no particular problem,
However, in case you are worried about a copyright infringement claim,
Set the volume to 0 for background music only in the in-game settings screen, or
We recommend that you display the following credit in the summary field.

All Music by Scott Buckley - released under CC-BY 4.0.
detailed_description:
This game merges stars produced from a black hole,
The game is a puzzle game to grow stars by merging stars produced from a black hole.

To give you the full experience of the collision of the 15 types of stars (satellites, quasi-planets, and planets) in our solar system,
The game is a 3D game with added physics, depth and rotation controls.

Gameplay can be controlled with the left hand only,
Enjoy the game while enjoying a snack with your right hand while listening to the soothing music.

You will be baptized with a lot of physics before the sun is formed,
We hope you enjoy the chaos of the game.

I am using my favorite music by scottbuckley for this game.

As long as his music is credited with his name,
You can use his music for free in any project (including commercial ones) as long as his name is credited.

That's why his credit is always displayed in the lower left corner of the game screen,
Even if he distributes his music on Youtube, there is no particular problem,

name: Planet Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz or AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Tired of making watermelons in 2D? Then the next step is to make a sun in 3D!
